title: Airport Security Announcement
transcript: This is a security announcement for all passengers. Please ensure that all liquids in your carry-on luggage are in containers of 100 milliliters or less and placed in a clear plastic bag. Electronic devices larger than a mobile phone must be removed from bags during security screening. Sharp objects, including scissors and knives, are not permitted in carry-on luggage. Please arrive at the airport at least two hours before domestic flights and three hours before international flights. Thank you for your cooperation.
